title: Spirit CAM XVID - STG
description:

Starring: Eva Mendes, Scarlett Johansson, Samuel L. Jackson, Gabriel Macht

Rookie cop Denny Colt returns from the beyond as The Spirit, a hero whose mission is to fight against the bad forces in Central City

[Work Done:]
Done the best i could with this,but donÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢t expect too much given the sources i had.
First thing was to strip the audio and use a noise reduction filter and then i slighty changed
the EQ and resaved.
Then it was a case of loading the video and new audio into xpress and then mess with the filters.
I firstly changed the contrastÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¦.needed to be increased alot ,also needed to increase the chroma to add
